name: Hiram
description: HIRAM Token is intended to be a utility token that should be used to establish a financial link between Freemasons in a fair and decentralized manner. The projectâ€™s goal is to democratize the use of cryptos and to allow low cost transfers between members of lodges, between lodges and their obediences and obediences between them. The investment in decentralized finance must be open to all.
